meanings.definition: To scan or digitize a photograph using a scanner or digital camera.
meanings.sent1: I will photoscan the old family photo to save it on my computer.
meanings.sent2: She photoscanned the picture to share it with her friends online.
meanings.sent3: The detective photoscanned the evidence to catch the criminal.
meanings.sent4: His eyes photoscanned the room, capturing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The artist photoscanned nature's beauty to create stunning digital art.

meanings.definition: A digital image created by scanning a photograph.
meanings.sent1: I printed out the photoscan of the beach to hang on my wall.
meanings.sent2: The photoscan of the sunset looked amazing on the computer screen.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the photoscan, creating a digital mess on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her smile in the photoscan lit up the room like sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The photoscan of the city skyline was so clear, it felt like you were there.
